I am a family man.
I spend as much time as i can with my family.
I am a pediatrician.
I am married with 2 children.

content.text: Hi, my name is John and I'm an engineer.
Hi, I'm Sarah and I'm a pediatrician.
Nice to meet you, Sarah. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family, especially my two children.
That's great. I love spending time with my family too. I have a dog and I love to dance salsa.
Salsa dancing sounds like fun. I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a great way to exercise and meet new people.
What do you like to do for work?
I'm a pediatrician and I love working with children. It's so rewarding to help them get healthy and grow.
That sounds like a great job. I'm glad you're doing something you love.
Thanks. I'm lucky to have a job that I'm passionate about.
I'm actually on a break from work right now. I decided to quit my job and travel for a couple of months.
That sounds like an amazing adventure. I've always wanted to travel more.
It's been a lot of fun so far. I've been to a few different countries and I've met some really interesting people.
That's great. I'm glad you're enjoying your trip.
Thanks. I'm sure I'll have some more stories to tell you when I get back.
I'm looking forward to hearing them.
